v.v: Yahweh, you have showed favor to your land;
You have forgiven the sin of your people;
You have withdrawn all your wrath;
Restore us, God of our salvation,
Will you be angry with us forever?
Will you not revive us again?
Show us your covenant faithfulness, Yahweh,
I will listen to what Yahweh God says,
Surely his salvation is near to those who fear him;
Covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness have met together;
Trustworthiness springs up from the ground,
Yes, Yahweh will give his good blessings,

v: you have restored the well-being of Jacob.
you have covered all their sin.
you have turned back from your hot anger.
and let go of your displeasure with us.
Will you remain angry throughout future generations?
Then your people will rejoice in you.
for he will make peace with his people, his faithful ones.
Yet they must not turn again to foolish ways.
then glory will remain in our land.
righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
and righteousness looks down from the sky.
and our land will yield its crops.
and make a way for his footsteps.
